I hope the teacher can speak a little faster when lecturing.
I love the teacher's energetic teaching style,  and I learned a lot from this lecture.
老師的大綱十分清晰，並且十分尊重同學的意見來適當調整各種課程上的安排

I am very honoured to be in the first class that Professor had taught in NCCU. Thank you so much to teacher for all the efforts! I had found my interest in marketing throughout the lessons, all the best to teacher in the future!
